Text.Name: Item_SoulCrystalYou
Text.Desc: A dark soul gem, containing some remaining painful memories.

Text.Name: Item_SoulCrystalNing
Text.Desc: A serene soul gem, containing some remaining memories.

Text.Name: Item_SoulCrystalLing
Text.Desc: A limpid soul gem, containing some remaining happy memories.

Text.Name: Item_SoulCrystalYuanLing
Text.Desc: It is a glitch in the ways of heaven that Sentient Spirits gained their sentience, while the Primordial Soul Gem is a trace of profoundness from such a glitch, being extracted from Sentient Spirit.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_CatSoul
Text.Desc: Soul fragment of a cat Yaoguai, probably has something to do with the saying that cats have nine lives. It contains some mysterious power, consuming it will grant you an extra sub-spirit. This item can only be taken once during a lifetime. Only effective to cultivators that have reached their Primordial Spirit phase.
